name: Xinming Ou
content: Xinming (Simon) Ou's Home Page Xinming (Simon) Ou Professor, Bellini College of Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity and Computing Director, Rapid7 Cyber Threat Intelligence Lab University of South Florida 4202 East Fowler Avenue, Office: ENC 2501, Mail Stop: ENG 030 Tampa, FL 33620, (813) 974-4522 xou AT usf DOT edu [Publications] [Google Scholar] [Curriculum Vitae] I am broadly interested in research that addresses pressing-need cybersecurity challenges. I am especially interested in research problems that arise from practical domains, with a focus on both experimental/empirical study and sound theoretical footings. My research findings have led me to the current interests in human-centric approach to security and computing in general. Computing is now so intimately integrated with all aspects of our social fabrics and this requires computing solutions be considered within the larger human/social contexts. We work with colleagues in anthropology and other social sciences backgrounds, to investigate security phenomena emanating within these larger contexts â€” from security operation centers to software development companies. The rapid advancement in artificial intelligence creates great opportunities to tightly integrate human and machine in security tasks, particularly for defense. If you are interested in joining my group, please contact me with your CV and a brief description of your research interest. Recent and upcoming professional activities Co-Chair, CCS'24 Doctoral Symposium Steering/Program Committee, Workshop on SOC Operations and Construction (WOSOC) Teaching Spring 2025: CNT 4419: Secure Coding Fall 2024: CIS 4622: Hands-on Cybersecurity Spring 2024: CIS 4622: Hands-on Cybersecurity CNT 4419: Secure Coding Spring 2023: CIS 4622: Hands-on Cybersecurity CNT 4419: Secure Coding Fall 2022: CIS 4622: Hands-on Cybersecurity Spring 2022: CIS 4622: Hands-on Cybersecurity Fall 2021: COP 4600: Operating Systems Students I am fortunate to work with these talented students.
